Package lab2.transportation.algorithm.vogel

Class VogelMatrix

java.lang.Object
lab2.transportation.algorithm.vogel.VogelMatrix
class VogelMatrix
extends java.lang.Object
This matrix is used in the Vogel algorithm to calculate the row and column differences and to cancel rows and columns.
Author:
Antonio Mihăeș

  • Method Details

    • getNextCell

      public MatrixCell getNextCell()
      Get the next cell in the cost matrix to be for the next delivery.
      Returns:
      the next cell, this will always be different

    • cancelRow

      public void cancelRow​(int row)
      Make it so that a row is not taken into consideration. This should be used when there is no supply.
      Parameters:
      row - row to be cancelled

    • isCancelled

      public boolean isCancelled()

    • cancelColumn

      public void cancelColumn​(int column)
      Make it so that a column is not taken into consideration. This should be used when there is no demand.
      Parameters:
      column - column to be cancelled

    • getMinColumnIndex

      private int getMinColumnIndex​(int column)
      Get the row index in a certain column which has the smallest value.
      Parameters:
      column - column in which to search
      Returns:
      the row index of the smallest value

    • getMinRowIndex

      private int getMinRowIndex​(int row)
      Get the column index in a certain row which has the smallest value.
      Parameters:
      row - row in which to search
      Returns:
      the column index of the smallest value
